	color:#404040;
	mso-themecolor:text1;
	mso-themetint:191;
	font-style:italic;}

	mso-style-link:"Intense Quote";

<body lang=EN-US style='tab-interval:.5in;word-wrap:break-word'>

<div class=WordSection1>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span
style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"TimesNewRomanPSMT",serif;mso-fareast-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt;
mso-ligatures:none'>Los Cuentos por categoria </span><span style='font-family:
"Times New Roman",serif;mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:
0pt;mso-ligatures:none'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span
style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"TimesNewRomanPSMT",serif;mso-fareast-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt;
mso-ligatures:none'>25 cuentos quechua de Yauyos Sur<br>
con desglose y traduccion al espanol e ingles </span><span style='font-family:
"Times New Roman",serif;mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:
0pt;mso-ligatures:none'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span
style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"TimesNewRomanPSMT",serif;mso-fareast-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt;
mso-ligatures:none'>Aviva Shimelman<br>
con<br>
Hilda Quispe y Esther Madueno </span><span style='font-family:"Times New Roman",serif;
mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:
none'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span
style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"TimesNewRomanPSMT",serif;mso-fareast-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt;
mso-ligatures:none'>Varios temas:<br>
Dos muchachos, la ancianita que los queria comer y la paloma que los salvo.
Dos hermanos  uno bueno y uno que se convirtio en lluwcho<br>
Dos Wankas que empiezan por compar una vaca y terminan por comer a gente El
gato que buscaba a su mama<br>
El toro en la iglesia (Verdeminas)<br>
El burro y la soga perdida </span><span style='font-family:"Times New Roman",serif;
mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:
none'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span
style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"TimesNewRomanPSMT",serif;mso-fareast-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt;
mso-ligatures:none'>Condenados<br>
Mano de baston </span><span style='font-family:"Times New Roman",serif;
mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:
none'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span
style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"TimesNewRomanPSMT",serif;mso-fareast-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt;
mso-ligatures:none'>Un compadre, su comadre, un anillo, un arete<br>
El trapo que no quiso romper<br>
La condenada en el segundo piso<br>
Dos enamorados, dos cuevas, un collar, un panteon Dos enamorados, el pajaro
de el y la cabeza de ella El perro calato color teja </span><span
style='font-family:"Times New Roman",serif;mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span
style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"TimesNewRomanPSMT",serif;mso-fareast-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt;
mso-ligatures:none'>La ovejera y la mosca </span><span style='font-family:"Times New Roman",serif;
mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:
none'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span
style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"TimesNewRomanPSMT",serif;mso-fareast-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt;
mso-ligatures:none'>La chica<br>
La chica, el hombre que la invita a cosechar papa y el ratoncito que correteaba
La chica, el hombre a quien ella regala su faja y el perro que la lleva puesto
La chica que buscaba antayluma<br>
La chica y el condor que la queria enganar </span><span style='font-family:
"Times New Roman",serif;mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:
0pt;mso-ligatures:none'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span
style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"TimesNewRomanPSMT",serif;mso-fareast-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt;
mso-ligatures:none'>Version I: La chica, el condor, un sapo y una olla </span><span
style='font-family:"Times New Roman",serif;mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span
style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"TimesNewRomanPSMT",serif;mso-fareast-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt;
mso-ligatures:none'>Version II: La chica, el condor, Dios y una olla La chica
y el gabilan </span><span style='font-family:"Times New Roman",serif;
mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:
none'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span
style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"TimesNewRomanPSMT",serif;mso-fareast-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt;
mso-ligatures:none'>El zorro<br>
El zorro, el conejo y el fin del mundo<br>
El zorro, los sapos y la carretera por la sequia El zorro, el condor y la
apuesta en la nieve<br>
El zorro que quiso comer el queso en el lago El zorro que se cayo del cielo<br>
El zorro que se hizo coser la boca<br>
El zorro que se pachamanco </span><span style='font-family:"Times New Roman",serif;
mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:
none'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span
style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"TimesNewRomanPSMT",serif;mso-fareast-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt;
mso-ligatures:none'>Version I: La pariuna con patas rojas Version II: El
wakchaw con patas amarillas </span><span style='font-family:"Times New Roman",serif;
mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:
none'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span
style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"TimesNewRomanPSMT",serif;mso-fareast-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt;
mso-ligatures:none'>Endnotes<br>
Apendice I: Codigos de los desgloses<br>
Apendice II: Nota sobre el quechua de Yauyos Sur y sus dialectos </span><span
style='font-family:"Times New Roman",serif;mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><b><span
style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"TimesNewRomanPS",serif;mso-fareast-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt;
mso-ligatures:none'>DOS MUCHACHOS, LA ABUELITA QUE LES QUERIA COMER, Y LA
PALOMA QUE LES SALVO VILLAFLOR (AZANGARO) </span></b><span style='font-family:
"Times New Roman",serif;mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:
0pt;mso-ligatures:none'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span
style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"TimesNewRomanPSMT",serif;mso-fareast-font-family:

none'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span
style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"TimesNewRomanPSMT",serif;mso-fareast-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt;
mso-ligatures:none'>pusha-yku-shtin-qa wambra-taq maki-n yatapa-shpa yanta-man
katra-n take-EXCEP-SUBADV-TOP child-ACC hand-3-ACC pat-SUBIS firewood-ALL
send-3 When she brought the boys [home], patting their hands, she sent them for
firewood. Cuando llevo a los ninos [a la casa], palmoteandoles las manos,
los mando por lena. </span><span style='font-family:"Times New Roman",serif;
mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:
none'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span

Cuando los mando para lena, pues, 'Ahora van a traer lena. </span><span

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span

say-3<br>

brought,&quot; she said. 'Ahora medio mes, medio ano, les voy a servir con la
lena que traje', les dijo. </span><span style='font-family:"Times New Roman",serif;

[When the blind old woman came to check if the boys were fattening up, she

[Cuando vino la ancianita ciega a verificar si los ninos se estaban
engordando, no toco los brazos de los ninos sino] toco el rabo del raton.

ask-3 why cry-REFL-2 dove say-3 no-EVD 2 know-2-NEG<br>
[One of the boys] asked, &quot;Doves, why are you crying?&quot; he said.
&quot;You [still] don't know. [Uno de los ninos] pregunto, 'Por que lloran,
palomas?' dijo. 'Tu no sabes [todavia]. </span><span style='font-family:"Times New Roman",serif;
mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:
none'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span

mso-ligatures:none'>kanan chay mamakuqa hatu-hatun payla-wan timpu-ya-chi-n
yaku-ta ni-n<br>
now DEM.D old.woman-TOP big big pot-INSTR boil-PROG-CAUS-3 water-ACC say-3
&quot;Now the old woman the boiling water in a great big pot.<br>
'Ahora esa anciana esta haciendo hervir agua en una olla tremenda. </span><span
style='font-family:"Times New Roman",serif;mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span
style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"TimesNewRomanPSMT",serif;mso-fareast-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#C4000A;
mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none'>'Kananqa kutiriptikiqa mikushunki',
nin. 'Altuman siqachishunki tichuman. </span><span style='font-family:"Times New Roman",serif;
mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:
none'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span
style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"TimesNewRomanPSMT",serif;mso-fareast-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt;
mso-ligatures:none'>kanan-qa kuti-ri-pti-ki-qa miku-shunki ni-n altu-man
siqa-chi-shunki tichu-man<br>
now-TOP return-INCEP-SUBDS-2-TOP eat-3&gt;2 say-3 high-ALL go.up-CAUS-3&gt;2
roof-ALL<br>
&quot;Now, when you go back, she's going to eat you!&quot; they said. 'She's
going to make you go up on the roof. 'Ahora cuando ustedes regresan los va a
comer', dijeron. 'Ella les va a hacer subir para encima, para el techo. </span><span
style='font-family:"Times New Roman",serif;mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span
style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"TimesNewRomanPSMT",serif;mso-fareast-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#C4000A;
mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none'>'Iskaliratanam trurarun. Amama

mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:
none'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span

mso-ligatures:none'>iskalira-ta-na-m trura-ru-n ama-mi-a siqa-ya-nki-chu
qam-qa<br>
ladder-ACC-DISC-EVD put-URGT-3 PROH-EVD-EMPH go.up-PROG-2-NEG 2-TOP &quot;She's
already set up a ladder. Don't go up!<br>
'Ya puso una escalera. No subes! </span><span style='font-family:"Times New Roman",serif;
mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:
none'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span

mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none'>'Chay mamakuta siqachinki primiru,

mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:
none'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span

mso-ligatures:none'>chay mamakuq-ta siqa-chi-nki primiru yatra-chi-shu-na-:-paq
ni-n<br>
DEM.D old.woman-ACC go.up-CAUS-2 first know-CAUS-2.OBJ-NMLZ-PURP say-3<br>
Make the old woman go up first. [Say you don't know how and she has to go] 'in
order to teach me,'&quot; they said. A esa anciana le vas a hacer subir
primero. [Di que no sabes como hacerlo]; &quot;para que me ensenes&quot;',
dijeron. </span><span style='font-family:"Times New Roman",serif;mso-fareast-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span
style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"TimesNewRomanPSMT",serif;mso-fareast-font-family:

mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none'>Chay mamakuqa siqan altupa. 'Imas

mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:
none'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span

mso-ligatures:none'>chay mamaku-qa siqa-n altu-pa ima-s ka-ku-ya-n-tri charki<br>
DEM.D old.lady-TOP go.up-3 high-LOC what-ADD be-REFL-PROG-3-EVC jerky<br>
[The boys did as the birds said]. The old woman went up [to the roof first].
&quot;What else would there be? Jerky. [Los ninos hicieron lo que las palomas
consejaron]. La anciana subio [primero]. 'Que tambien habra? Charki. </span><span
style='font-family:"Times New Roman",serif;mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span

know-1-NEG &quot;What else would there be to take out?&quot; [asked the boys]
So, &quot;You go up [first],&quot; said [a boy]. &quot;I don't know how.&quot;
'Que tambien habra para sacar?' [preguntaron los ninos] De alli, 'Sube
usted. Yo no se', dijo [uno de los ninos]. </span><span style='font-family:
"Times New Roman",serif;mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span

Then, they say, [one of the boys shouted to the other], &quot;Throw over the
ladder!&quot; he said. Despues, dice, [uno de los ninos grito al otro,]

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span

mso-ligatures:none'>&quot;She herself is going to fall,&quot; he said. The old

[the other boy]. Se murio la anciana. 'Alli mismo la vas a degollar!' dijo

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span

mso-ligatures:none'>chay ka-ya-n pay-pis ganaw-ni-yuq pay-qa ka-ya-n vaka-yuq
ubiha-yuq lliw<br>
DEM.D be-PROG-3 3-ADD cattle-EUPH-POSS 3-TOP be-PROG-3 cow-POSS sheep-POSS
everything He, he, too, has cattle. He has cows, he has sheep. Everything.<br>
El, el tambien tiene ganado. Tiene vacas, tiene ovejas. Todo. </span><span
style='font-family:"Times New Roman",serif;mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span
style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"TimesNewRomanPSMT",serif;mso-fareast-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#C4000A;
mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none'>Qamnataq mana imayuqpis kankichu.
Chay wambraykita katrarunki mayurnikikama, wawqikikamaqa. </span><span
style='font-family:"Times New Roman",serif;mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span
style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"TimesNewRomanPSMT",serif;mso-fareast-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt;
mso-ligatures:none'>qam-na-taq mana ima-yuq-pis ka-nki-chu chay wambra-yki-ta
katra-ru-nki mayur-ni-ki-kama wawqi-ki-kama-qa 2-DISC-SEQ no what-POSS-ADD
be-2-NEG DEM.D child-2-ACC send-URGT-2 older-EUPH-2-LIM brother-2-RSTR- TOP<br>
You don't have anything. You sent your children over to your older brother, to
your brother.<br>
Tu no tienes nada. Mandaste a tus hijos donde tu hermano mayor, donde tu
hermano. </span><span style='font-family:"Times New Roman",serif;mso-fareast-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span
style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"TimesNewRomanPSMT",serif;mso-fareast-font-family:

mso-ligatures:none'>En eso, dijo, te fuiste al cerro. Te fuiste a buscar esa
vicunita para domesticar. </span><span style='font-family:"Times New Roman",serif;

mso-ligatures:none'>ambisiya-ku-q ri-pta-mu-n ka-ya-shpa-chu kanan chay-ta
ri-n-man strive-REFL-AG go-SUBDS-3 be-PROG- now DEM.D-ACC go-3-COND He went
with greed. Now, with nothing, he could go there.<br>
Con ambicion, se fue. Ahora, sin nada, podia ir alli. </span><span
style='font-family:"Times New Roman",serif;mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

deer-ALL cliff-LOC live-REFL-3 person be-PROG-3 jacket-REFL-PRF person Into
deer. They lived on the cliff. They are people, people in jackets.<br>
En venado. Vivian en la pena. Son personas, personas con sacos. </span><span
style='font-family:"Times New Roman",serif;mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span
style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"TimesNewRomanPSMT",serif;mso-fareast-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#C4000A;
mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none'>Kabra  qalaman, shapla  kabrahina 
kay kabrayhina sayaq. Trayamun, kutirun runa. </span><span style='font-family:
"Times New Roman",serif;mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:
0pt;mso-ligatures:none'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span
style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"TimesNewRomanPSMT",serif;mso-fareast-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt;
mso-ligatures:none'>kabra qala shapla kabra-hina kay kabra-y-hina saya-q
traya-mu-n kuti-ru-n runa<br>
goat naked hairless goat-COMP DEM.P goat-1-COMP stand-AG arrive-CISL-3
return-URGT-3 person<br>
Goats  naked, with hair  like goats, like my goats standing here. They were
cooked. They turned [from] people. Cabras  calatos, peludos  como cabras,
como mis cabras paradas aqui. Llegaron, [de] gente volvieron. </span><span
style='font-family:"Times New Roman",serif;mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span
style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"TimesNewRomanPSMT",serif;mso-fareast-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#C4000A;
mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none'>Waqrayuq wambrapis, waqrayuq.
Lumbakama trinakunaqa, lumbakama kakuyan. </span><span style='font-family:"Times New Roman",serif;
mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:
none'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span

mso-ligatures:none'>waqra-yuq wambra-pis waqra-yuq lumba-kama trina-kuna-qa
lumba-kama<br>
horn-POSS child-ADD horn-POSS hornless-LIM female-PL-TOP hornless-RSTR
ka-ku-ya-n be-REFL-PROG-3 The children, too, had horns, had horns. The females
were without horns, they were without horns.<br>
Los ninos, tambien, tienen cachos, tienen cachos. Las hembras no tienen
cachos, son sin cachos. </span><span style='font-family:"Times New Roman",serif;
mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:
none'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span

mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none'>Machukunaqa waqrayuq hamuykakuyan,
nin. Chay niptin nishpa, ripukun pasaypaq. 'Chit!' </span><span
style='font-family:"Times New Roman",serif;mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span
style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"TimesNewRomanPSMT",serif;mso-fareast-font-family:

mso-ligatures:none'>machu-kuna-qa waqra-yuq hamu-yka-ku-ya-n ni-n chay ni-pti-n
ni-shpa ripu-ku-n pasaypaq chit<br>
male-PL-TOP horn-POSS come-EXCEP-REFL-PROG-3 say-3 DEM.D say-SUBDS-3 say-SUBIS
go-REFL-3 completely chit<br>
The males are coming to have horns, he said. When he said that, saying, they
say, they left for good. &quot;Chit!&quot;<br>
Los machos estaban llegando a tener cachos, dijo. Cuando lo dijo, diciendo,
dice, se fueron para siempre. 'Chit!' </span><span style='font-family:"Times New Roman",serif;
mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:
none'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span

Chit-chitting, the goats just left.<br>
Chit-chitiando, las cabras se fueron. </span><span style='font-family:"Times New Roman",serif;

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span

the hills now.<br>
Salieron de la cueva para siempre. Para siempre se fueron  venado en la puna
ahora. </span><span style='font-family:"Times New Roman",serif;mso-fareast-font-family:

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span
style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"TimesNewRomanPSMT",serif;mso-fareast-font-family:

mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none'>Vinawllanam mirakuyan,
waqrayuqkamana. Aa, chayshi manash invidyusu kaytaq atipanchikmanchu. </span><span

mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span

mso-ligatures:none'>vinaw-lla-na-m mira-ku-ya-n waqra-yuq-kama-na ahhh,
chay-shi mana-sh invidyusu<br>
deer-RSTR-DISC-EVD multiply-REFL-PROG-3 horn-POSS-LIM-DISC ah DEM.D-EVR no-EVR
kay-taq jealous DEM.P-SEQ be-able-1PL-COND-NEG atipa-nchik-man-chu<br>
Just deer already. They're multiplying, all with horns already. Ah, that's why,
they say, we can't be jealous.<br>
Venado, ya no mas. Esta aumentando, todos con cachos. Ah, por eso no podemos
ser invidiosos. </span><span style='font-family:"Times New Roman",serif;
mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span

ugly-EVR jealous DEM.P-ACC-TOP DEM.D-VRBZ-EVD It's awful, they say, to be

Feo, dicen, es ser invidioso. Asi es. </span><span style='font-family:"Times New Roman",serif;
mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><b><span

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span

&quot;The hairless dog took a bone.&quot; &quot;Where did he take it
from?&quot; &quot;It's stored in the store-house.&quot;<br>
'El perro calato llevo el hueso'. 'De donde lo llevo?' 'Estaba guardado en

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span

'Donde se fue?' 'Esta alla en el rincon de la qullqa'. </span><span

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span
style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"TimesNewRomanPSMT",serif;mso-fareast-font-family:

none'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span

mso-ligatures:none'>chay-lla-m chay ni-shpa-sh qala ni-ra- ichi-ta uchuk

joke-REFL-PST-3 mother-3- ACC<br>
Saying that, the dog said. A cat, a small cat made fun of his mother.<br>
Asi diciendo, dijo el perro. Un gato, un gato chiquito se burlo de su mama. </span><span
style='font-family:"Times New Roman",serif;mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

DMY Some of them are killing [the cow]; others of them are grilling it; another
all umm ...<br>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span

"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt;
mso-ligatures:none'>yanga-na-sh aqtu-n-pis ima-pis Wanka-qa runa-masi-n-ta
miku-ru-sa-<br>
in.vain-DISC-EVR vomit-3-ADD what-ADD Wanka-TOP person-PART-3-ACC
eat-URGT-NPST-3 In vain, already, they say, he spit everything out. The
Huancayoans had eaten their fellow humans. En vano ya, dicen, todo escupio.
Los Huankainos habian comido a su semejante. </span><span style='font-family:
"Times New Roman",serif;mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:
0pt;mso-ligatures:none'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><b><span
style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"TimesNewRomanPS",serif;mso-fareast-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt;
mso-ligatures:none'>EL TORO EN LA IGLESIA YURACSAYHUA (VINAC) </span></b><span
style='font-family:"Times New Roman",serif;mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span

mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none'>Sumaq sumaq kwivuchayuq chay iglisyaqa
karqa. </span><span style='font-family:"Times New Roman",serif;mso-fareast-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span
style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"TimesNewRomanPSMT",serif;mso-fareast-font-family:

mso-ligatures:none'>Sumaq sumaq kwivu-cha-yuq chay iglisya-qa ka-rqa-<br>
pretty pretty recess-DIM-POSS DEM.D church-TOP be-PST-3 That church was really
pretty, with little recesses.<br>
Esa iglesia era muy bonita, con cuevecitos. </span><span style='font-family:
"Times New Roman",serif;mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:
0pt;mso-ligatures:none'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span

mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none'>Turupis manachu kakuyan pirqapa?
Sumaq sumaq. </span><span style='font-family:"Times New Roman",serif;
mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:
none'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span

mso-ligatures:none'>turu-pis mana-chu ka-ku-ya-n pirqa-pa sumaq sumaq bull-ADD
no-NEG be-REFL-PROG-3 wall-LOC pretty pretty Wasn't there a bull, too, on the
wall? Really pretty.<br>
No habia un toro, tambien, en la pared? Bien bonito. </span><span
style='font-family:"Times New Roman",serif;mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span

mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none'>Figura alli-allin nam waqarasapa.

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span

figure good-good DMY-EVD horn-MULT.POSS DEM.D-EVR inside-LOC church-GEN
inside-3-LOC bull sleep-PST A stutue with really big horns. So, they say,
inside, the bull slept inside the church.<br>
Una estatua bien bien cachudo. Luego, dicen, dentro, dentro de la iglesia
dormia el toro. </span><span style='font-family:"Times New Roman",serif;
mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span

mso-ligatures:none'>chay-shi iglisya uku-paq turu lluqsi-shpa wanu-pa ri-q.<br>
DEM.D-EVR church inside-LOC bull come.out-SUBIS die-GEN go-AG<br>
So, they say, the bull, would come out crom inside the church and go [around]
during the dying moon. Luego, dicen, el toro, saliendo desde el interior de la
iglesia, andaba en lna muerta. </span><span style='font-family:"Times New Roman",serif;
mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:
none'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

DMY-3 road-3-ACC Qunari-ALL corner-ALL Qunari-ABL-TOP up-ACC hill-3-ACC go-AG<br>
[He would go] via the road towards Cunyari, towards the corner, and then from
Cunyari he'd go up along the hills. [Iba] por la carreterra hacia Cunari,
hacia la esquina, y de Cunari iba arriba por los cerros. </span><span
style='font-family:"Times New Roman",serif;mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

un viejo seguia. Luego, dicen, [el viejo] se fue juntando esa bosta, ese oro,
con un costal. </span><span style='font-family:"Times New Roman",serif;

gold  not like us now.<br>
Eran buenos, seguro. Manejaban dolares, oro puro  no como nosotros ahora. </span><span
style='font-family:"Times New Roman",serif;mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span

before person-GEN-TOP pure gold be-PST-3 DMY-3-ADD The ancient people's
[things] were pure gold.<br>
Las [cosas] de la gente de antes eran de oro puro. </span><span

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span
style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"TimesNewRomanPSMT",serif;mso-fareast-font-family:

mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none'>Asta achanpis, asta barritanpis ima
pikunpis puru uru asiru. </span><span style='font-family:"Times New Roman",serif;
mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:
none'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span
style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"TimesNewRomanPSMT",serif;mso-fareast-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt;
mso-ligatures:none'>asta acha-n-pis asta barrita-n-pis ima piku-n-pis puru uru
asiru<br>
until axe-3-ADD until lever-3-ADD what pick-3-ADD pure gold steel Even their
axes, even their levers, their picks, too  pure gold and steel. Hasta sus
hachas, hasta sus barretas, sus picos  oro puro y acero. </span><span
style='font-family:"Times New Roman",serif;mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span

sweet-DISC.EVD be-3 Now there isn't [any of] that, then. There are cheap mixes
 any old soft iron.<br>
Ahora no hay [nada de] eso, pues. Hay mezclas  cualquier fierro dulce. </span><span
style='font-family:"Times New Roman",serif;mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span

come.out-CISL-3 church-ABL big-big white horse come.out-CISL-AG then-EVR ugly
ugly fire eye The horses came out of the church. A really big white horse would
come out then, [with] terrible eyes of fire.<br>
Los caballos salian de la iglesia. Grandes, grandes caballos blancos salian
entonces con horribles ojos de fuego. </span><span style='font-family:"Times New Roman",serif;
mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:

What would have happened? They don't have clothes any more, they said. A whole

There were two buckets, they say. The capes of the statues would have been all

santos habran estado chapiadas de oro puro, seguro. </span><span

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span

mso-ligatures:none'>par-ni-ntin kambiya-ku-na-n-paq puru aseraw uru-m kay
kuruna-cha-n i<br>
pair-EUPH-INCL change-REFL-NMLZ-3-PURP pure steel gold-EVD DEM.P crown-DIM-3
and In pairs, so that they could change them. Pure steel. Their little crowns
were gold and<br>
Con pares, para que se las cambien. Acero puro. Sus coronitas eran de oro y </span><span

mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span
style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"TimesNewRomanPSMT",serif;mso-fareast-font-family:

mso-ligatures:none'>Asnu-qa ni-n mana-m nuqa tari-si-sayki suga-yk-ita-qa
putriru alfa-ta qu-yka-ma-y ni-n runa-ta-qa<br>
mule-TOP say-3 no-EVD 1 find-ACMP- rope-2-ACC ranch alfalfa-ACC
give-EXCEP-1.OBJ-IMP say-3 person-ACC-TOP The mule said, &quot;No. I'm going to
help you find your rope. Give me a basket-full of alfalfa,&quot; he said to the
man.<br>
El burro dijo, 'No. Yo te voy a hacer encontrar tu soga. Dame un potrero de
alfalfa', he said to the man. </span><span style='font-family:"Times New Roman",serif;
mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:
none'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span
style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"TimesNewRomanPSMT",serif;mso-fareast-font-family:

mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none'>Hinaptinnataq ya tardillam

none'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span
style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"TimesNewRomanPSMT",serif;mso-fareast-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt;
mso-ligatures:none'>hinaptin-na-taq ya tardi-lla-m traya-ra-chi-mu-shaq
suga-yki-ta ni-n asnu-qa<br>
then-DISC-SEQ EMPH afternoon-RSTR-EVD arrive-URGT-CAUS-CISL-1.FUT rope-2-ACC
say-3 mule-TOP Then, &quot;This afternoon, I'm going to deliver your rope to
you,&quot; said the mule.<br>
Despues, 'En la tarde, te voy a hacer llegar tu soga', dijo el burro. </span><span
style='font-family:"Times New Roman",serif;mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span
style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"TimesNewRomanPSMT",serif;mso-fareast-font-family:

mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none'>'Ya', nin. Putriru alfalfata quykun.
Asnuqa mikuyan chayta. Mikushpaqa </span><span style='font-family:"Times New Roman",serif;

OK say-3 basket-full alfalfa-ACC give-EXCEP-3 mule-TOP eat-PROG-3 DEM.D-ACC

mule is eating it. When he ate,<br>
'Ya', dijo y el potrero de alfalfa le dio. El burro esta comiendolo. Comiendo
</span><span style='font-family:"Times New Roman",serif;mso-fareast-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span

they said then, Dos zorros llegaron con sogas. Cuando los dos zorros llegaron

none'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span

The donkey died here. &quot;Now let's pull with this rope,&quot; he said and
the two pulled him towards the ravine.<br>
El burro se murio aqui. 'Ahora hay que jalar con esta soga' dijo y los dos
jalaron a la sanga. </span><span style='font-family:"Times New Roman",serif;
mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:

hacia la casa del hombre. 'Yo te dije. Esta moviendo. Te lo dije'. </span><span

&quot;You said to me, &quot;Was he tikshuing or was he moving?&quot; I said to

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span

mso-ligatures:none'>wanu-sa-ta-na traya-ra-chi-n chay runa ka-q-man
intriga-chi-ku-n suga-n-ta<br>
die-PRF-ACC-DISC arrive-URGT-CAUS-3 DEM.D person be-AG-ALL deliver-CAUS-REFL-3
rope-3-ACC He delivered it dead already to the man's place. He had the rope
delivered.<br>
Muerto ya hizo llegar tambien donde esa persona. Hizo entregar la soga. </span><span
style='font-family:"Times New Roman",serif;mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span
style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"TimesNewRomanPSMT",serif;mso-fareast-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#C4000A;
mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none'>Ese es todo. Puchukarunna. Chayllash
unay kwintuta willakura papani:. </span><span style='font-family:"Times New Roman",serif;
mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:
none'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span
style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"TimesNewRomanPSMT",serif;mso-fareast-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt;
mso-ligatures:none'>Puchuka-ru-n-na chay-lla-sh unay kwintu-ta willa-ku-ra-
papa-ni-:<br>
finish-URGT-3-DISC DEM.D-RSTR-EVR before story-ACC tell-REFL-PST-3
father-EUPH-: That's all. It's over. Just like that, my father told me the
story before.<br>
Ese es todo. Se termino. Asi no mas, dicen, mi papa me conto ese cuento
antes. </span><span style='font-family:"Times New Roman",serif;mso-fareast-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span
style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"TimesNewRomanPSMT",serif;mso-fareast-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#C4000A;
mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none'>Unayshi kay Vinacpa kashqa huk runa. </span><span
style='font-family:"Times New Roman",serif;mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><b><span
style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"TimesNewRomanPS",serif;mso-fareast-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt;
mso-ligatures:none'>MANO DE BASTON CUNYARI (VINAC) </span></b><span
style='font-family:"Times New Roman",serif;mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span
style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"TimesNewRomanPSMT",serif;mso-fareast-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt;
mso-ligatures:none'>unay-shi kay Vinac-pa ka-shqa- huk runa<br>
before-EVR DEM.P Vinac-LOC be-NPST-3 one person Once upon a time, they say,
there was a man here in Vinac. Antes, dicen, habia un hombre aqui en Vinac.
</span><span style='font-family:"Times New Roman",serif;mso-fareast-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span
style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"TimesNewRomanPSMT",serif;mso-fareast-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#C4000A;
mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none'>Kurapa impliyadum  Lluqi Maki.
Chayshi sapa tardi kampanata ripikakuq. </span><span style='font-family:"Times New Roman",serif;
mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:
none'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span
style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"TimesNewRomanPSMT",serif;mso-fareast-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt;
mso-ligatures:none'>kura-pa impliyadu-m Lluqi Maki chay-shi sapa tardi
kampana-ta ripika-ku-q<br>
priest-GEN employee-EVD Lluqi Maki [Strong Hand] DEM.D-EVR every afternoon
bell-ACC ring-REFL-AG<br>
He was an employee of the priest  [his name was] Lluqi Maki [Strong Arm].
Every afternoon, he rang the [church] bell. Era el empleado del cura  [se
llamaba] Mano de baston. Todas las tardes [Mano de baston] chankaba la
campana. </span><span style='font-family:"Times New Roman",serif;mso-fareast-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span
style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"TimesNewRomanPSMT",serif;mso-fareast-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#C4000A;
mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none'>Aburrikurun sakristanqa wamaq wamaq

mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:
none'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span

mso-ligatures:none'>aburri-ku-ru-n sakristan-qa wama wamaq kampana-ta
suyna-chi-pti-n bore-REFL-URGT-3 deacon-TOP a.lot a.lot bell-ACC
sound-CAUS-SUBDS-3 The sacistran got annoyed when he rang the bell so much.<br>
El sacristan se aburrio cuando tanto hacia sonar la campana. </span><span
style='font-family:"Times New Roman",serif;mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span

mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none'>'Chaytaqa mancharachimushaq, karahu,

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span

mso-ligatures:none'>chay-ta-qa mancha-ra-chi-mu-shaq karahu nuqa-qa
DEM.D-ACC-TOP scare-URGT-CAUS-REFL-1.FUT damn.it 1-TOP &quot;I'm going to scare
him damn it,&quot;<br>
'Lo voy a hacer asustar, carajo, yo', </span><span style='font-family:"Times New Roman",serif;
mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:
none'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span

mso-ligatures:none'>ni-shpa ri-n huk tardi-qa kapa-ka-ru-shpa kama-n-ta

say-SUBIS go-3 one afternoon-TOP cover-REFL-URGT-SUBIS blanket-3-ACC
cover-REFL-URGT-SUBIS he said and he went [to the bell tower] one afternoon,

dijo y se fue una tarde tapandose con su frazada, </span><span

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span

arrive-URGT-3 Lluqi Maki-TOP he went up high into the bell tower. Then he
waited there in the tower. Lluqi Maki arrived.<br>
subio encima hacia la campana. Despues, alli en la torre esperaba. Llego
Mano de baston. </span><span style='font-family:"Times New Roman",serif;
mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:
none'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span

mso-ligatures:none'>traya-ru-pti-n-qa altu-pa karahu alma-qa suya-ya-sa- alma
karahu arrive-URGT-SUBDS-3-TOP high-LOC bastard soul-TOP wait-PROG-NPST-3 soul
bastard When he arrived up there, a ghost was waiting. &quot;Damn ghost!<br>
Cuando llego encima estaba esperando alma. 'Alma carajo! </span><span
style='font-family:"Times New Roman",serif;mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span
style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"TimesNewRomanPSMT",serif;mso-fareast-font-family:

mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none'>Bahamuy!' nin. 'Bahamuy, karahu!'
nin. Nada. </span><span style='font-family:"Times New Roman",serif;mso-fareast-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span
style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"TimesNewRomanPSMT",serif;mso-fareast-font-family:

mso-ligatures:none'>baha-mu-y ni-n baha-mu-y karahu ni-n nada<br>
go.down-CISL-IMP say-3 go.down-CISL-IMP bastard say-3 nothing<br>
&quot;Get down!&quot; he said. [But it didn't come down. Again:] &quot;Get
down, damn it!&quot; he said. Nothing. 'Bajate!' dijo. [Pero no bajo. Otra
vez:] 'Bajate carajo!' dijo. Nada. </span><span style='font-family:"Times New Roman",serif;
mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:
none'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span

so go.up-SUBIS-TOP throw-EXCEP-URGT-CISL-3 inside-ACC soul-ACC-TOP So [Lluqi
Maki] climbed up and threw the ghost inside.<br>
Luego, subio y tiro al alma hacia dentro. </span><span style='font-family:
"Times New Roman",serif;mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:
0pt;mso-ligatures:none'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span

mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span

mso-ligatures:none'>soul-TOP die-NMLZ-3-LIM ground-ALL fall-URGT-3
fall-SUBDS-TOP bell-ACC ring-URGT-3<br>
The ghost fell to the floor, to his death. When [the ghost] fell, [Lluqi Maki]
started tolling the bell.<br>
El alma cayo al suelo, a hasta que se muera. Cuando se cayo [el alma], [Mano
de baston] se puso a tocar la campana. </span><span style='font-family:"Times New Roman",serif;
mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:
none'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span
style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"TimesNewRomanPSMT",serif;mso-fareast-font-family:

mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none'>Kampanata ripikaykushpaqa bahamun. </span><span

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span
style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"TimesNewRomanPSMT",serif;mso-fareast-font-family:

mso-ligatures:none'>kampana-ta ripika-yku-shpa-qa bahamun<br>

down [out of the tower]. Despues de repicar la campana, bajo [de la torre]. </span><span
style='font-family:"Times New Roman",serif;mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span

mso-ligatures:none'>ima-tr chay alma ka-sa- qawa-yku-shaq ni-shpa kama-wan

what-EVC DEM.D soul be-NPST-3 see-EXCEP-1.FUT say-SUBIS blanket-INSTR
wrap-UNINT-INTENS-AG-ACC &quot;What could that ghost have been? I'm going to
look,&quot; he said [and looked] at who was wrapped in the blanket.<br>
'Que habra sido esa alma? Voy a ver', dijo [y vio] a quien estaba envuelto
con la frazada. </span><span style='font-family:"Times New Roman",serif;

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span
style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"TimesNewRomanPSMT",serif;mso-fareast-font-family:

the blanket. When he looked, the sacristan had died.<br>
Abrio la cama. Cuando miro, el sacristan habia muerto. </span><span
style='font-family:"Times New Roman",serif;mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span
style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"TimesNewRomanPSMT",serif;mso-fareast-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#C4000A;
mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none'>Sakristanta wanurachisa. Hinaptinshi
kusinirun: 'Chay karqa Lluqi Makiqa'. </span><span style='font-family:"Times New Roman",serif;
mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:
none'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span
style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"TimesNewRomanPSMT",serif;mso-fareast-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt;
mso-ligatures:none'>sakristan-ta wanu-ra-chi-sa- hinaptin-shi kusiniru-n
karqa- chay ka-rqaLluqi Maki-qa sacristan-ACC die-URGT-CAUS-NPST-3 then-EVR
cook-3 DEM.D be-PST-3 Lluqi Maki-TOP He had killed the sacristan! Then, they
say, the cook [said], &quot;It was Lluqi Maki [who did it].&quot; Habia
matado al sacristan! Despues, dice, la cocinera, [dijo], 'Era Mano de baston
[quien lo hizo]'. </span><span style='font-family:"Times New Roman",serif;
mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:
none'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span

mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none'>Yayayman trayarun. 'Yayay', nin,

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span

mso-ligatures:none'>yayay-man traya-ru-n yayay ni-n sakristan-ta-m
wanu-paku-ru-ni ni-n<br>
priest-ALL arrive-URGT-3 priest say-3 sacristan-ACC-EVD die-MUTBEN-PST-3 say-3
[Lluqi Maki] went to the priest. &quot;Father,&quot; he said, &quot;I killed
the deacon [by mistake],&quot; he said. [Lluqi Maki] llego [donde el] padre.
'Padre', dijo, 'mate al sacristan', dijo. </span><span style='font-family:

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span

mso-ligatures:none'>chay-paq tuta-yku-ru-n tuta-yku-ru-shpa bila-ta prindi-ru-n<br>
DEM.D-ABL night-EXCEP-URGT-3 night-EXCEP-URGT-SUBIS candle-ACC light-URGT-3
Later, night fell. When it got dark, he lit a candle.<br>
Luego, se cayo la noche. Cuando se oscurecio, prendio una vela. </span><span
style='font-family:"Times New Roman",serif;mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span
style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"TimesNewRomanPSMT",serif;mso-fareast-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#C4000A;
mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none'>Bilanta prindiruptin kayan diripinti 
bum!  altupaq saqaykaramun pidasus </span><span style='font-family:"Times New Roman",serif;

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span

When he arrived, they say, he said, &quot;Under the moon, we'll fight for just
a little while.&quot; They fought for just a little while. Cuando llego le
dijo ya, 'Con luna un rato no mas vamos a pelear'. Un rato no mas ya
pelearon. </span><span style='font-family:"Times New Roman",serif;mso-fareast-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span
style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"TimesNewRomanPSMT",serif;mso-fareast-font-family:

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span

mso-ligatures:none'>hinaptin-shi kanan kay-pi-m intiyru ka-ya-n ni-shpa-qa
qawa-yka-chi-n<br>
so-EVR now DEM.P-LOC-EVD buried.treasure be-PROG-3 say-SUBIS-TOP
look-EXCEP-CAUS-3 Then, [the zombie said], &quot;Now, there is buried treasure
here,&quot; he said and showed it [to Lluqi Maki]. Despues, 'Ahora en aca hay
entierro', le dijo y lo hizo ver [a Lluqi Maki]. </span><span style='font-family:
"Times New Roman",serif;mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:
0pt;mso-ligatures:none'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span
style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"TimesNewRomanPSMT",serif;mso-fareast-font-family:

mso-ligatures:none'>kay pampapa uku-n-pa pampa-ra-ya-n qullqi-y ni-n intiyru
ni-n<br>
DEM.P ground-LOC inside-3-LOC bury-UNINT-INTENS-3 money-1 say-3 buried.treasure
say-3 &quot;My money is buried in this ground,&quot; he said. &quot;Buried
treasure,&quot; he said.<br>
''Dentro de esta pampa esta enterrado mi plata', dijo. 'Entierro', le dijo. </span><span
style='font-family:"Times New Roman",serif;mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span
style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"TimesNewRomanPSMT",serif;mso-fareast-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#C4000A;
mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none'>'Kaywan pampachiwanki', nin. 'Qampaqmi
qali qali imaypis kidanqa', nin. </span><span style='font-family:"Times New Roman",serif;
mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:
none'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span

mso-ligatures:none'>kay-wan pampa-chi-wa-nki ni-n qam-paq-mi qali qali
ima-y-pis kida-nqa ni-n<br>
DEM.P-INSTR bury-CAUS-1.OBJ-2 say-3 2-BEN-EVD all all what-1-ADD remain-3.FUT
say-3 &quot;You're going to bury me with this [shovel],&quot; he said.
&quot;You can keep everything, all that I have,&quot; he said. 'Con esta
[lampa] me vas a enterrar', le dijo. 'Para ti todas, todas mis cosas van a
quedar', le dijo. </span><span style='font-family:"Times New Roman",serif;
mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:
none'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span

mso-ligatures:none'>kimsa puntraw kimsa tuta-m bila-wa-nki ni-n<br>
three day three night-EVD hold.vigil-1.OBJ-2 say-3<br>
&quot;You'll hold vigil for me for three days and three nights,&quot; he said.

mso-ligatures:none'>kay runa-kuna-pis hunta-ra-mu-n-na lliw<br>
DEM.P person-PL-ADD gather-URGT-CISL-3-DISC all The people [of the village?],

middle night stretch-REFL-URGT-3 self-RSTR-3 die-URGT-3<br>
At midnight, he himself, alone, stretched himself out [on the ground] and died.
A media noche el mismo solito se estiro [en el suelo] y se murio. </span><span

three night three day then bury-CAUS-3<br>
[and they burned] for three days and three nights. Then they buried him [he was
no longer a zombie]. tres noches, tres dias. Despues lo enterrararon. [Ya no
era condenado]. </span><span style='font-family:"Times New Roman",serif;

Esa persona, ese wanka se volvio a su pueblo. </span><span style='font-family:

wanka devil must have died.<br>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span

earring are buried.<br>
Cuando se murio, atras de la piedra su arete y su anillo estan entrerrados. </span><span
style='font-family:"Times New Roman",serif;mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span
style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"TimesNewRomanPSMT",serif;mso-fareast-font-family:

mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none'>'Kutimushaq', nishpa chay pindihuqa
manam warminman trayachinchu. </span><span style='font-family:"Times New Roman",serif;
mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:
none'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span
style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"TimesNewRomanPSMT",serif;mso-fareast-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt;
mso-ligatures:none'>kuti-mu-shaq ni-shpa-sh chay pindihu-qa mana-m warmi-n-man

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span

what be.sick-INF-EVC 3-ACC-ADD grab-3 then nor return-REFL-CISL-RSTR-3-DISC-NEG
What sickness would have taken hold of him? Then he didn't come back.<br>
Que enfermedad habra agarrado a el tambien? Ya no regreso. </span><span
style='font-family:"Times New Roman",serif;mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span
style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"TimesNewRomanPSMT",serif;mso-fareast-font-family:

mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none'>Paqwash. Chay vidaqa huktatr kakuyan. </span><span
style='font-family:"Times New Roman",serif;mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span

mso-ligatures:none'>paqwash chay vida-qa huk-ta-tri ka-ku-ya-n<br>
completely DEM.D life-TOP one-ACC-EVC be-REFL-PROG-3 That life would be
completely otherwise.<br>
Esa vida tambien seria completamente otra. </span><span style='font-family:
"Times New Roman",serif;mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:
0pt;mso-ligatures:none'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><b><span
style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"TimesNewRomanPS",serif;mso-fareast-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt;
mso-ligatures:none'>EL TRAPO QUE NO QUISO ROMPER SAN PEDRO DE HUACARPANA </span></b><span

mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span

DEM.D animarka bring-URGT-3&gt;2 EMPH DEM.P-LOC be-PROG-3 Animarka ghost-COMP
EMPH DEM.P Animarka There in Animarka they'll take you away, then. Animarka
is around here. Animarka is like a ghost.<br>
Alla, Animarka te va a llevar, pues. Aqui esta Anmarka. Es como un
encanto, pues, esta Animarka. </span><span style='font-family:"Times New Roman",serif;
mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span

take-3&gt;2<br>
A young man will appear. Then he'll say to you, &quot;Let's go! I'll take you
over there.&quot; Va a parecer un joven y despues te va a decir, 'Vamonos.
Por alla te voy a llevar.' </span><span style='font-family:"Times New Roman",serif;

DEM.D-RSTR-LOC lose-URGT-2 suck-URGT-3&gt;2 aya ah DEM.D-VRBZ-RSTR-DISC EMPH

Alli no mas te vas a perder. Te va a chupar [la sangre]. Aya. As. Asi no

When you walk at night, when you walk in the silence.<br>
Eso es de noche, pues. De dia no hay nada. Eso es cuando caminas de noche,
cuando caminas en silencio. </span><span style='font-family:"Times New Roman",serif;

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span

Cuando lo jalabas de noche, venia. Despues </span><span style='font-family:

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span

mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none'>'Imapaq aysapamaranki? Nuqa hawka
punukupti:', nishpash. Manchachiman. </span><span style='font-family:"Times New Roman",serif;
mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:
none'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span

mso-ligatures:none'>imapaq aysa-pa-ma-ra-nki nuqa hawka punu-ku-pti-:

why pull-REPET-1.OBJ-PST-2 1 calm sleep-REFL-SUBDS-1 say-SUBIS-EVR
scare-CAUS-1.OBJ-3 &quot;Why did you tug at me when I was sleeping peacefully?
It scared me.&quot;<br>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span

DMY-COMP in.vain grow-INF-ACC grow-EXCEP-AG-RSTR be-PST-3 brush-COMP Like that
... They grew for the sake of it. They grew like shrubs.<br>
Como este ... crecian por crecer, como monte. </span><span style='font-family:
"Times New Roman",serif;mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span
style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"TimesNewRomanPSMT",serif;mso-fareast-font-family:

mso-ligatures:none'>chay utrku-lla-pa-na uywa-ku-pti-n-na-taq-shi chay
maqta-qa pashna-ta apa-rqa- miku-na-n-ta<br>
DEM.D cave-RSTR-LOC-DISC keep-REFL-SUBDS-3-DISC-SEQ-EVR DEM.D young.man-TOP
girl-ACC bring-PST-3 eat-NMLZ-3-ACC<br>
When he had the girl in that cave, the young man brought the girl his food.<br>
Cuando la tenia en esa cueva, el muchacho llevaba su comida a la chica. </span><span
style='font-family:"Times New Roman",serif;mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

Cuando lo miro bien, dicen, tenia un perrito blanco, chapito. </span><span

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span
style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"TimesNewRomanPSMT",serif;mso-fareast-font-family:

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span

0pt;mso-ligatures:none'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

neck-3 then-EVR Then, when she arrived [one of the young men] was snoring
&quot;qaqshhqaqshh&quot; from out of his neck. Then, they say, Luego, cuando
[la chica] llego [uno de los muchachos] estaba roncando del cuello. Luego,

straw-LOC So, they say, she told them, &quot;My necklace is hidden in my house
under the straw.<br>
De alli, dice, les aviso, 'Mi collar esta escondido en mi casa dentro de la
paja. </span><span style='font-family:"Times New Roman",serif;mso-fareast-font-family:

be-AG-ACC arrive-URGT-CISL-3 night Then, they say, turning into a zombie, he
arrived at the girl's place at night.<br>

mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none'>'Kayhinam wawayki kay yataypa wanukun
purikushqaypa', nin. </span><span style='font-family:"Times New Roman",serif;
mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:
none'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span

mso-ligatures:none'>kay-hina-m wawa-yki kay yata-y-pa wanu-ku-n
puri-ku-shqa-y-pa ni-n<br>
DEM.P-COMP-EVD baby-2 DEM.P side-1-LOC die-REFL-3 walk-REFL-PRF-1-LOC say-3
&quot;My [love] died at my side, where I walked,&quot; she said.<br>
'Asi mi [amor] se murio en mi lado donde andaba', dijo. </span><span

mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

</span><span style='font-family:"Times New Roman",serif;mso-fareast-font-family:

&quot;When he died, I buried him.&quot; &quot;Then how did my son come out of

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span
style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"TimesNewRomanPSMT",serif;mso-fareast-font-family:

mso-ligatures:none'>allqu-chu mana-m chay-qa nuqa-m ka-rqa-ni icha allqu-.
ka-nki ni-n. dog-NEG no-EVD DEM.D-TOP 1-EVD be-PST-1 or dog-EVD be-2 say-3
&quot;That wasn't a dog. It was me. Or you're a dog,&quot; he said.<br>
'No era perro. Ese era yo. Cuidado que eres perro'. Dijo. </span><span
style='font-family:"Times New Roman",serif;mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span

"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt;
mso-ligatures:none'>liyon miku-sa- tuqa-pa-yku-n wanu-sa-chu ka-ya-n ni-shpa<br>
lion eat-NPST-3 spit-REPET-EXCEP-3 die-PRF-Q be-PROG-3 say-SUBIS A lion was
eating it and spit repeatedly. &quot;Is it dead?&quot; he said.<br>
Un leon lo comio. Lo escupio. 'Esta muerto?' dijo. </span><span
style='font-family:"Times New Roman",serif;mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span

style='font-family:"Times New Roman",serif;mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span

'Que esta haciendo ya? A ver. Voy a ver'. Vino. </span><span
style='font-family:"Times New Roman",serif;mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span

mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none'>He
disappeared into all the holes.<br>
Ya no estaba la chica. Un sapo no mas. </span><i><span style='font-size:10.0pt;

kurr, kurr! S</span></i><span style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"TimesNewRomanPSMT",serif;

mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none'>e pirdio en todos los huecos. </span><span

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span

mso-ligatures:none'>hinaptin-shi kuti-ru-n kundur kanan matray-man utrku-man

returned to the cave, to the hole and, in rage, he ate his son.<br>

comio a su hijo. </span><span style='font-family:"Times New Roman",serif;

ate him. Then, they say, &quot;Ah, yes, damn. Where am I going to find her

Lo comio. Despues, dice, 'Ah, si, carajo, donde voy a encontrarla ahora?' </span><span

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span
style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"TimesNewRomanPSMT",serif;mso-fareast-font-family:

mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none'>Yana tirnuyuq chay pashnawan purirqa.
Chayshi pashnaqa wiksayuq rikarirun. </span><span style='font-family:"Times New Roman",serif;
mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:
none'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span
style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"TimesNewRomanPSMT",serif;mso-fareast-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt;
mso-ligatures:none'>yana tirnu-yuq chay pashna-wan puri-rqa- chay-shi

DEM.D condor-TOP &quot;That condor is going to eat you now,&quot; he said, they
say. &quot;That condor is going to eat you.&quot;<br>
'Ahora ese condor te va a comer', dijo, dicen. 'Ese condor te va a comer'. </span><span
style='font-family:"Times New Roman",serif;mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span

mso-ligatures:none'>pasa-ku-y mama-yki-pa wasi-n-ta ripu-ku-y ni-n-shi<br>

DEM.D-RSTR-EVD They left each other. Then, he neither returned nor came any
more. The end. That's all.<br>
Se dejaron. Despues, ni volvio ni se fue. Termino. Eso no mas. </span><span
style='font-family:"Times New Roman",serif;mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><b><span
style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"TimesNewRomanPS",serif;mso-fareast-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt;
mso-ligatures:none'>EL ZORRO, EL CONEJO, Y EL FIN DEL MUNDO LISCAY </span></b><span

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span

grab-PROG-NPST-3 [The fox] made a bet with a rabbit. The rabbit grabbed a

'No. Hoy dia aqui hay cumpleanos'. </span><span style='font-family:"Times New Roman",serif;
mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:
none'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span

mso-ligatures:none'>chay-mi kay kay-pa hurqa-ra-ma-nki kay hawla-paq
hinapti-ki-qa<br>
DEM.D-EVD DEM.P DEM.P-LOC take.out-URGT-1.OBJ-2 DEM.P cage-ABL then-TOP
&quot;So, take me out of this, out of this cage here!' Then,<br>
'Por eso, sacame de esto, de esta jaula aqui!' Despues, </span><span
style='font-family:"Times New Roman",serif;mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><b><span

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span

frog-PL before be-PST-3 frog-PL win-MUTBEN-3 before say-PST-3 fox-INSTR-EVR
win-RECIP-PST-3<br>
Once upon a time, there were frogs. Long ago, they said, the frogs competed
against a fox, ah, they competed against a fox. Mas antes, habian sapos ....
Antes, dijeron, los sapos competieron contra un zorro, ah, competieron contra
un zorro. </span><span style='font-family:"Times New Roman",serif;mso-fareast-font-family:

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span

fox one-EUPH-3 'kurr' one-EUPH-3 'laq' one-EUPH-3 'kurr', one-EUPH-3 'laq'<br>
The fox, one goes &quot;kurr,&quot; the other goes &quot;laq,&quot; nne goes
&quot;kurr,&quot; the other goes &quot;laq.&quot; El zorro, uno dice 'kurr', el
otro dice 'laq', uno dice 'kurr', el otro dice 'laq'. </span><span
style='font-family:"Times New Roman",serif;mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span

mso-ligatures:none'>chay laq-ni-q nap karu karu-pi ka-ya-n surru kurri-ya-n
sapu-qa<br>
DEM.D laq-EUPH-AG DMY-p far far-LOC be-PROG-3 fox run-PROG-3 frog-TOP The </span><i><span
style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"TimesNewRomanPS",serif;mso-fareast-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt;
mso-ligatures:none'>laq </span></i><span style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:
"TimesNewRomanPSMT",serif;mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none'>one is already very
far; the fox is running. The frog ....<br>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span

kundur hinashpa<br>
DMY-LOC condor bet-NPST-3 fox-INSTR fox-INSTR bet-NPST-3 condor then<br>
And the same [with] the condor. He made a bet with the fox. the condor made a
bet with the fox. Then, Y lo mismo [con] el condor. Aposto con el zorro. El
condor aposto con el zorro. Despues, </span><span style='font-family:"Times New Roman",serif;
mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:
none'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span
style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"TimesNewRomanPSMT",serif;mso-fareast-font-family:

and the condor ate him, the fox himself.<br>

mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

altuta siqaru siqaruq </span><span style='font-family:"Times New Roman",serif;

asi, lo solto arriba y [el toro] asi subia arriba. </span><span

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span

heaven-LOC condor be-NPST- priest no-EVD condor In heaven the condor was a
proest, not a condor. Then,<br>
En el cielo el condor era padre, no condor. Despues, </span><span
style='font-family:"Times New Roman",serif;mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span
style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"TimesNewRomanPSMT",serif;mso-fareast-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#C4000A;
mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none'>Kundurshi trayarushpaqa, pawakushpa
rikun. Kidakun. Atuqhina siyluta. </span><span style='font-family:"Times New Roman",serif;
mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:
none'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span
style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"TimesNewRomanPSMT",serif;mso-fareast-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt;
mso-ligatures:none'>kundur-shi traya-ru-shpa-qa pawa-ku-shpa ri-ku-n kida-ku-n
atuq-hina na-ta siylu-ta.<br>
condor-EVR arrive-URGT-SUBIS-TOP jump-REFL-SUBIS go-REFL-3 stay-REFL-3 fox-COMP
heaven-ACC When the condor arrived, they say, he jumped and left. [The fox]
stayed. Like a fox to heaven.<br>
Cuando el condor llego, dicen, saltando, se fue. Se quedo [el zorro]. Como
zorro al cielo. </span><span style='font-family:"Times New Roman",serif;
mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:
none'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span
style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"TimesNewRomanPSMT",serif;mso-fareast-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#C4000A;
mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none'>Hinaptin, 'Imaynataq kutishaq?
Imaynataq kutishaq?' nishpa nin atuq. Llakikun. </span><span style='font-family:
"Times New Roman",serif;mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:
0pt;mso-ligatures:none'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span
style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"TimesNewRomanPSMT",serif;mso-fareast-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt;
mso-ligatures:none'>hinaptin imayna-taq kuti-shaq imayna-taq kuti-shaq ni-shpa
ni-n atuq llaki-ku-n<br>
then how-SEQ return-1.FUT how-SEQ return-1.FUT say-SUBIS say-3 fox
be.sad-REFL-3 Then, &quot;How am I going to go back? How am I going to go
back?&quot; said the fox. He was sad. Despues, 'Como voy a volver? Como voy
a volver?' dijo el zorro. Tenia pena. </span><span style='font-family:"Times New Roman",serif;
mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:
none'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span
