"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#C4000A;
mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none'>'Kumpadri! Kumpadri' diharuptinqa
nin. </span><span style='font-family:"Times New Roman",serif;mso-fareast-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span
style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"TimesNewRomanPSMT",serif;mso-fareast-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt;
mso-ligatures:none'>kumpadri kumpadri diha-ru-pti-n-qa ni-n<br>
compadre compadre leave-URGT-SUBDS-3-TOP say-3<br>
&quot;Compadre, compadre,&quot; said [the fox] when [the condor] abandoned him.
'Compadre! Compadre!' dijo [el zorro] cuando [el condor lo] abandono. </span><span
style='font-family:"Times New Roman",serif;mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span
style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"TimesNewRomanPSMT",serif;mso-fareast-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#C4000A;
mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none'>Hinashpash, 'Alli ach-achka kakuyan',
nishpa. Wayurash kasa. Wayura. </span><span style='font-family:"Times New Roman",serif;
mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:
none'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span
style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"TimesNewRomanPSMT",serif;mso-fareast-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt;
mso-ligatures:none'>hinashpa-sh alli ach achka ka-ku-ya-n ni-shpa wayura-sh
ka-sa- wayura<br>
then-EVR good a.lot a.lot be-REFL-PROG-3 say-SUBIS wayura-EVR be-NPST-3 wayura
Then, they say, &quot;There's a whole lot of wayura,&quot; he said. There was
wayura, they say. Wayura. Despues, dicen, 'Hay mucha wayura', dijo. Wayura,
dicen, habia. Wayura. </span><span style='font-family:"Times New Roman",serif;
mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:
none'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span

mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none'>Hinaptinshi chaytanataq katrun. </span><span

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span

mso-ligatures:none'>hinaptin-shi chay-ta-na-taq katru-n </span><span

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span

mso-ligatures:none'>then-EVR DEM.D-ACC-DISC-SEQ chew-3 Then, they say, he

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span

cut-SUBIS DEM.P-ACC chew-URGT-SUBIS-TOP three day-EVR chew-URGT-3 after cutting
it. He chewed this  for three days, they say, he chewed it.<br>
despues de cortarlo. Masco esta  tres dias, dicen, masco. </span><span
style='font-family:"Times New Roman",serif;mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span

mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none'>Hatu-hatuntatriki siylupaq asta

"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span

mso-ligatures:none'>hatu-hatun-ta-tri-ki siylu-paq asta kay-LIM.<br>
big-big-ACC-EVC-KI heaven-ABL until DEM.P-RSTR<br>
It must have been really big, for sure  [to reach] from heaven all the way
here. Grande grande habra sido, seguro  [para llegar] desde el cielo hasta
aca. </span><span style='font-family:"Times New Roman",serif;mso-fareast-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span

mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none'>Hinaptinshi waskilluwan bahamun

"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span

mso-ligatures:none'>hinaptin-shi waskillu-wan baha-mu-n atuq-qa.<br>
then-EVR waskillu-INSTR go.down-CISL-3 fox-TOP<br>
Then, they say, the fox lowered himself with the wayura rope. Despues con la
soga de wayura bajo el zorro. </span><span style='font-family:"Times New Roman",serif;
mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span

inside-ACC-DISC pretty pretty DEM.P-VRBZ-EVR go.down-REFL-PROG-CISL-3 He is
lowering himself inside nicely like that, they say.<br>
Se esta bajando bien bonito adentro ya asi. </span><span style='font-family:
"Times New Roman",serif;mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:
0pt;mso-ligatures:none'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span

parrot-PL DEM.D corn thief parrot-PL EMPH When he was lowering himself, loros
passed by. Parrots  parrots that steal corn, then.<br>
Cuando estaba bajando, pasaron loritos. Loros esos que roban maiz. </span><span
style='font-family:"Times New Roman",serif;mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span

mso-ligatures:none'>hinaptin-shi ni-n luru, lani-y-hina-m wak sinqa luru<br>
then-EVR say-3 parrot penis-1-COMP-EVD DEM.D nose parrot Then, they say, he
said, &quot;Parrot, your nose is like my 'little bird!'&quot; Despues, dicen,

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span

mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span

mso-ligatures:none'>waskillu-y-ta-na-taq katra-yku-waq ni-n wak-hina-ta-na
ri-ya-shpa-qa<br>
waskillu-1-ACC-DISC-SEQ release-EXCEP-2.COND say-3 DEM.D-COMP-ACC-DISC
go-PROG-SUBIS-TOP &quot;Be careful you don't let go of my rope,&quot; he said.
Going along like that,<br>
'Cuidado que sueltes mi soga ya tambien', dijo. Asi ya yendo, </span><span
style='font-family:"Times New Roman",serif;mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span
style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"TimesNewRomanPSMT",serif;mso-fareast-font-family:

mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none'>uyarishpaqa, kutiramushpa siyrtumpa

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span

"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt;
mso-ligatures:none'>uyari-shpa-qa kuti-ra-mu-shpa siyrtumpa waskillu-ta
katra-yku-ru-n atuq-pa-ta<br>
hear-SUBIS-TOP return-URGT-CISL-SUBIS true waskillu-ACC release-EXCEP-URGT-3
fox-GEN-ACC listening, coming back, in truth, he let go of the fox's rope.<br>
escuchando, volviendo, de verdad solto el waskillo del zorro. </span><span
style='font-family:"Times New Roman",serif;mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span
style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"TimesNewRomanPSMT",serif;mso-fareast-font-family:

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span
style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"TimesNewRomanPSMT",serif;mso-fareast-font-family:

mso-ligatures:none'>hinashpa-sh kumpadri muruchu-ta mashta-y muruchu-ta
mashta-y bup<br>
then-EVR compadre barley-ACC scatter-IMP barley-ACC scatter-IMP bup<br>
Then, they say. &quot;Compadre, scatter barley! Scatter barley!&quot; Bup! He
fell to the ground. Despues, dicen, 'Compandre, Tiende moron. Tiende
moron!. Bup. Se cayo al suelo. </span><span style='font-family:"Times New Roman",serif;
mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:
none'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span
style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"TimesNewRomanPSMT",serif;mso-fareast-font-family:

mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none'>Murio. Chaynash hinaptin trayarachin
siylumanqa. Hinashpa trayarachishpaqa, </span><span style='font-family:"Times New Roman",serif;
mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:
none'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span
style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"TimesNewRomanPSMT",serif;mso-fareast-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt;
mso-ligatures:none'>chay-na-sh hinaptin traya-ra-chi-n siylu-man-qa hinashpa
traya-ra-chi-shpa-qa DEM.D-VRBZ-EVR then arrive-URGT-CAUS-3 heaven-ALL-TOP then
arrive-URGT-CAUS-TOP He died. So, they say, then he delivered him to heaven.
Then, when he delivered him,<br>
Murio. Asi, dicen, despues lo hizo llegar al cielo. Haciendo llegar, </span><span
style='font-family:"Times New Roman",serif;mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span
style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"TimesNewRomanPSMT",serif;mso-fareast-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#C4000A;
mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none'>pawashpa rikurun. Diharun pay atuqtaqa
hinaptin sapallanta. Llakikuyan atuqqa. </span><span style='font-family:"Times New Roman",serif;
mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:
none'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span
style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"TimesNewRomanPSMT",serif;mso-fareast-font-family:

mso-ligatures:none'>atuq-pa shimi-n qacha-ru-n hatu hatun fox-GEN mouth-3
break-URGT-3 big big The fox's mouth ripped open wide.<br>
La boca del zorro se rompio muy grande. </span><span style='font-family:"Times New Roman",serif;
mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:
none'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span

"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#C4000A;
mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none'>Hinaptinqa, 'Kumpadri, yanga yanga
shimi:ta sirarachinki. Kananqa shimilla: qacharun hatu hatun'. </span><span
style='font-family:"Times New Roman",serif;mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span

mso-ligatures:none'>hinaptin-qa kumpadri yanga yanga shimi-ta sira-ra-chi-nki

then-TOP compadre in.vain in.vain mouth-1-ACC sew-URGT-CAUS-2 now-TOP
mouth-1-RSTR break-URGT-3 big big Then, &quot;Compadre, you had my mouth sewed
up just for the fun of it. Now my mouth has ripped open wide!&quot;<br>
Despues, 'Compadre por gusto, por gusto, me hiciste coser la boca. Ahora mi
boca se rompio muy grande!' </span><span style='font-family:"Times New Roman",serif;
mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:
none'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span

De alli el zorro empezo a comer la cabra. Ya no respeto. </span><span
style='font-family:"Times New Roman",serif;mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><b><span

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span
style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"TimesNewRomanPSMT",serif;mso-fareast-font-family:

mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none'>'Kumpadri, imaynataq qampa trakikiqa
kayan qillu qillucha? Nuqapaqa. </span><span style='font-family:"Times New Roman",serif;
mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:
none'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span
style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"TimesNewRomanPSMT",serif;mso-fareast-font-family:

mso-ligatures:none'>kumpadri imayna-taq qam-pa traki-ki-qa ka-ya-n qillu
qillu-cha Nuqa-pa-qa<br>
compadre how-SEQ 2-GEN foot-2-TOP be-PROG-3 yellow yellow-DIM 1-GEN-TOP
&quot;Compadre, how is it that your feet are really nice and yellow? Mine
[aren't] 'Compadre, como es que tus pies son bien amarillos? Los mios [no lo
son]. </span><span style='font-family:"Times New Roman",serif;mso-fareast-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span
style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"TimesNewRomanPSMT",serif;mso-fareast-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#C4000A;
mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none'>'Chayna trakikikama qillu qillu',
dijo, dicen. </span><span style='font-family:"Times New Roman",serif;
mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:
none'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span
style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"TimesNewRomanPSMT",serif;mso-fareast-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt;
mso-ligatures:none'>chay-na traki-ki-kama qillu qillu<br>
DEM-VRBZ foot-2-LIM yellow yellow<br>
&quot;Your feet are really yellow like that,&quot; he said, they say. 'Asi,
tus pies son bien amarillos', dijo, dicen. </span><span style='font-family:
"Times New Roman",serif;mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:
0pt;mso-ligatures:none'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span
style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"TimesNewRomanPSMT",serif;mso-fareast-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#C4000A;
mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none'>'Manam ispantashpa, watyaruy! Chayna
qillu qillumi kanqa trakikiqa', dijo, dicen. </span><span style='font-family:
"Times New Roman",serif;mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:
0pt;mso-ligatures:none'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span
style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"TimesNewRomanPSMT",serif;mso-fareast-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt;
mso-ligatures:none'>mana-m espanta-shpa watya-ru-y chay-na qillu qillu-mi
ka-nqa traki-ki-qa<br>
no-EVD scare-SUBIS bake-URGT-IMP DEM.D-VRBZ yellow yellow-EVD be-3.FUT
foot-2-TOP &quot;Without getting scared, bake them! That way your feet will be
really yellow,&quot; he said, they say. 'Sin espantar, pachamancalos! Asi,
bien amarillos van a ser tus pies', dijo, dicen. </span><span style='font-family:
"Times New Roman",serif;mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:
0pt;mso-ligatures:none'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span
style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"TimesNewRomanPSMT",serif;mso-fareast-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt;
mso-ligatures:none'>It's true  the fox buried his son. He had baked himself!
Verdad, el zorro enterro a su hijo. Se habia pachamancado! </span><span
style='font-family:"Times New Roman",serif;mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span

"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt;
mso-ligatures:none'>Table. Morpheme codes (sorted by code) </span><span
style='font-family:"Times New Roman",serif;mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

     position:relative;top:1.0pt;mso-text-raise:-1.0pt;mso-font-kerning:0pt;
     mso-ligatures:none'>2 </span></i><span style='font-family:"Times New Roman",serif;

     none'><o:p></o:p></span></li>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><b><span
style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"TimesNewRomanPS",serif;mso-fareast-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt;
mso-ligatures:none'>Apendice I: Codigos </span></b><span style='font-family:
"Times New Roman",serif;mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:
0pt;mso-ligatures:none'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span
style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"TimesNewRomanPSMT",serif;mso-fareast-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt;
mso-ligatures:none'>Glosses were prepared in accord with the Leipzig glossing
rules. For reasons of space, two deviations from the standard abbreviations
were made: proximal demonstrative is not rendered DEM.PROX but DEM.P; and
distal demonstrative is not rendered DEM.DIST but DEM.D. </span><span
style='font-family:"Times New Roman",serif;mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span
style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"TimesNewRomanPSMT",serif;mso-fareast-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt;
mso-ligatures:none'>The following table lists the gloss abbreviations employed
and the morphemes to which they correspond. Morphemes are common to all
dialects unless otherwise specified (AH indicates the
Azangaro-Chocos-Huangascar dialect; AMV, Apuri-Madean-Vinac; CH,
Cacra-Hongos; LT, Lincha-Tana; SP, San Pedro de Huacarpan). </span><i><span
style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"TimesNewRomanPS",serif;mso-fareast-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt;
mso-ligatures:none'>A </span></i><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:
"TimesNewRomanPSMT",serif;mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none'>indicates
alternation between [ya] and an accent shift to the final syllable. </span><i><span
style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"TimesNewRomanPS",serif;mso-fareast-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt;
mso-ligatures:none'>H, I, N, </span></i><span style='font-size:11.0pt;
font-family:"TimesNewRomanPSMT",serif;mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none'>and
</span><i><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"TimesNewRomanPS",serif;
mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none'>S </span></i><span style='font-size:
11.0pt;font-family:"TimesNewRomanPSMT",serif;mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none'>indicate
alternations between [</span><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Cambria Math",serif;
mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:"Cambria Math";
mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none'></span><span style='font-size:11.0pt;
font-family:"TimesNewRomanPSMT",serif;mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none'>]
and [h], [i], [n], and [s], respectively. </span><i><span style='font-size:
11.0pt;font-family:"TimesNewRomanPS",serif;mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none'>U
</span></i><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"TimesNewRomanPSMT",serif;
mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none'>indicates alternation between [u] and
[a]. </span><i><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"TimesNewRomanPS",serif;
mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none'>Y </span></i><span style='font-size:
11.0pt;font-family:"TimesNewRomanPSMT",serif;mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none'>indicates
alternation between [y], [i] and [</span><span style='font-size:11.0pt;
font-family:"Cambria Math",serif;mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-bidi-font-family:"Cambria Math";mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none'></span><span
style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"TimesNewRomanPSMT",serif;mso-fareast-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt;
mso-ligatures:none'>]. </span><i><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:
"TimesNewRomanPS",serif;mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none'>PI </span></i><span
style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"TimesNewRomanPSMT",serif;mso-fareast-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt;
mso-ligatures:none'>indicates an alternation between [pi] and [] (specific to
the case of additive - </span><i><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:
"TimesNewRomanPS",serif;mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none'>pis. </span></i><span
style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"TimesNewRomanPSMT",serif;mso-fareast-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt;
mso-ligatures:none'>These five alternations are conditioned by environment in
all dialects. </span><i><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"TimesNewRomanPS",serif;
mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none'>R </span></i><span style='font-size:
11.0pt;font-family:"TimesNewRomanPSMT",serif;mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none'>indicates
alternative realizations of */r/  realized as [r] in all dialects except that
of CH, where it is predominantly realized as [l]. Where two morphemes share the
same code (as occurs, for example in the case of -</span><i><span
style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"TimesNewRomanPS",serif;mso-fareast-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt;
mso-ligatures:none'>pa </span></i><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:
"TimesNewRomanPSMT",serif;mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none'>and -</span><i><span
style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"TimesNewRomanPS",serif;mso-fareast-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt;
mso-ligatures:none'>pi</span></i><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:
"TimesNewRomanPSMT",serif;mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none'>, which both
indicate locative case) the code is subscripted with a number (i.e., LOC</span><span
style='font-size:6.0pt;font-family:"TimesNewRomanPSMT",serif;mso-fareast-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";position:relative;
top:1.0pt;mso-text-raise:-1.0pt;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none'>1</span><span
style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"TimesNewRomanPSMT",serif;mso-fareast-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt;
mso-ligatures:none'>, LOC</span><span style='font-size:6.0pt;font-family:"TimesNewRomanPSMT",serif;
mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
position:relative;top:1.0pt;mso-text-raise:-1.0pt;mso-font-kerning:0pt;
mso-ligatures:none'>2</span><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"TimesNewRomanPSMT",serif;
mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none'>). Where the same morpheme has two or
more functions (as is the case, for example, with - </span><i><span
style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"TimesNewRomanPS",serif;mso-fareast-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt;
mso-ligatures:none'>paq</span></i><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:
"TimesNewRomanPSMT",serif;mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none'>, which indicates
ablative, benefactive and purposive cases) the morpheme is subscriped (i.e., </span><i><span
style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"TimesNewRomanPS",serif;mso-fareast-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt;
mso-ligatures:none'>-paq</span></i><i><span style='font-size:6.0pt;font-family:
"TimesNewRomanPS",serif;mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";position:relative;top:1.0pt;mso-text-raise:-1.0pt;mso-font-kerning:
0pt;mso-ligatures:none'>1</span></i><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:
"TimesNewRomanPSMT",serif;mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none'>, </span><i><span
style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"TimesNewRomanPS",serif;mso-fareast-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt;
mso-ligatures:none'>-paq</span></i><span style='font-size:6.0pt;font-family:
"TimesNewRomanPSMT",serif;mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";position:relative;top:1.0pt;mso-text-raise:-1.0pt;mso-font-kerning:
0pt;mso-ligatures:none'>2 </span><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:
"TimesNewRomanPSMT",serif;mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none'>, </span><i><span
style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"TimesNewRomanPS",serif;mso-fareast-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt;
mso-ligatures:none'>-paq</span></i><span style='font-size:6.0pt;font-family:
"TimesNewRomanPSMT",serif;mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";position:relative;top:1.0pt;mso-text-raise:-1.0pt;mso-font-kerning:
0pt;mso-ligatures:none'>3</span><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"TimesNewRomanPSMT",serif;
mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none'>). Unless otherwise noted, a morpheme
occurs in all five dialects. Where a morpheme is exclusive to one or more
dialects, that is indicated in small caps in parentheses. A second table
follows that lists the morphemes and their corresponding glosses. </span><span
style='font-family:"Times New Roman",serif;mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-ligatures:none'><o:p></o:p></span></p>
